Document.Title: Beginning Node.js
Document.Description: Beginning Node.js is your step-by-step guide to learning all the aspects of creating maintainable Node.js applications.
Document.Author: Basarat Ali Syed

Document.Title: Pro Node.js for Developers
Document.Description: Pro Node.js for Developers provides readers already familiar with JavaScript with a stand-alone reference to Node.js
Document.Author: Colin J. Ihrig

Document.Title: Practical Node.js
Document.Description: Practical Node.js is your step-by-step guide to learning how to build scalable real-world web applications
Document.Author: Azat Mardan
